ValidationRule.description: Maximum No. of Registrants is required to update Status from Define to Design
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( OR ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Activity_Request', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Coaching_Request', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Program_Request', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Stand_Alone_Unit_Module_Request' ), ISCHANGED( Product_Request_Status__c ), ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE(Product_Request_Status__c ), 'Define'), ISPICKVAL( Product_Request_Status__c, 'Design'), ISBLANK( Maximum_Number_Of_Registrants__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: “Maximum No. of Registrants” is required to update the Product Request Status.
